World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest world news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ 2024 年 2 月 14 日星期三 14:08:41 GMT 120
Once disgraced, Indonesia's ex-commander Prabowo on track for presidencyDismissed from the military amid speculation of rights abuses, exiled in Jordan, and once banned from the United States, Indonesian Defence Minister Prabowo Subianto is now poised to be the country's next leader on his third try for the office. Wed, 14 Feb 2024 14:04:11 GMT V2QY3IRCSRNPVFID46XWI45TNQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/once-disgraced-indonesias-ex-commander-prabowo-track-presidency-2024-02-14/Kate Lamb世界亚太地区
Indonesia's Prabowo poised for power, but how will he rule?Indonesia has seen many faces of Defence Minister Prabowo Subianto over his decades in the public eye – the cheshire grin that accompanies his recent viral dance moves, flashes of his temper in fervent orations and the humiliation when he was dismissed from the military in 1998. Wed, 14 Feb 2024 13:46:06 GMT GMJ2V5RZIJN2BGZZYIBO6NZEQM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/indonesias-prabowo-poished-power-how-will-he-rule-2024-02-14/Kate Lamb世界亚太地区
Canada to donate $44 mln to Ukraine for defenceCanada will donate $44 million to Ukraine to help in its war with Russia, Canadian Defence Minister Bill Blair said on Wednesday as he met with NATO military allies in Brussels. Wed, 14 Feb 2024 13:26:22 GMT PQI56XPTNVNS7PX46YJERAJAUI https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/canada-donate-44-mln-ukraine-defence-2024-02-14/Reuters世界美洲
U.S says its forces launch strike on missile in Houthi-controlled part of YemenU.S. Central Command (CENTCOM) said its forces launched a strike on Tuesday on a cruise missile that was about to be fired at ships in the Red Sea from an area of Yemen controlled by the Iranian-backed Houthi group. Wed, 14 Feb 2024 13:23:18 GMT XATQIXIBDZMKHL4LDC3XRA73W4 https://www.reuters.com/world/us-says-its-forces-launch-strike-missile-houthi-control-part-yemen-2024-02-14/Reuters世界
French interior minister cannot be prosecuted over rape accusations, top court rulesFrench Interior Minister Gerald Darmanin cannot be prosecuted for accusations of rape made by a woman for years, France's highest court ruled on Wednesday, definitively dismissing the case and ending a seven-year legal battle. Wed, 14 Feb 2024 13:22:00 GMT 7U7N7AGUSVLLJGCTDRMWRH6SVQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/french-interior-minister-cannot-be-prosecuted-rape-accusations-top-court-2024-02-14/Reuters世界欧洲
Two 'micro' quakes shake Mexico City residents out of bedTwo minor earthquakes were felt in Mexico city on early on Wednesday morning, waking up residents across the capital although no damages were immediately reported and the temblors did not trigger alarms. Wed, 14 Feb 2024 13:10:26 GMT U4NC2ORQ4RKKFNQTXL2DS2XZFY https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/earthquake-felt-mexico-city-2024-02-14/Reuters世界美洲
Who could feature in a Russia-US prisoner swap?Russian President Vladimir Putin said last week that it might be possible to free Wall Street Journal reporter Evan Gershkovich, who is awaiting trial in Moscow on spying charges, in exchange for a Russian jailed abroad. Wed, 14 Feb 2024 13:09:33 GMT SIU4SCUKI5MWNIJAPGXHF5RYJ4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/who-could-feature- Russia-us-prisoner-swap-2024-02-14/Reuters世界欧洲
France's Sarkozy found guilty of illegal campaign financing, appeals court confirmsFormer French President Nicolas Sarkozy was found guilty on Wednesday by a Paris appeals court of illegal campaign financing over his failed 2012 re-election bid, confirming a previous ruling by a lower court. Wed, 14 Feb 2024 13:04:16 GMT 45NU2FEDYFNBDOXWG2FSA7DQDY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/frances-sarkozy-found-guilty-illegal-campaign-financing-appeals-court-confirms-2024-02-14/Juliette Jabkhiro世界欧洲
How Europe can dodge a birth rate hard landingFor Emmanuel Macron, more babies are vital to maintain France's national vigour. Italy's Georgia Meloni has made encouraging more Italian women to give birth a top priority. Wed, 14 Feb 2024 13:03:20 GMT QLXIAW7U7VKP7G4UW3KLU3MO44 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/how-europe-can-dodge-birth-rate-hard-landing-2024-02-14/Mark John, Anne Kauranen, Gergely Szakacs世界欧洲
Philippines deploys warship in western waters to 'safeguard maritime interests'The Philippines has deployed a warship off the waters of Palawan island facing the South China Sea to "protect its maritime interests", a senior navy official said, in a move that may irk China. Wed, 14 Feb 2024 12:43:31 GMT YUHVZTSIZZJKLBUDZY2ZH4ZOLQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/philippines-deploys-warship-western-waters-safeguard-maritime-interests-2024-02-14/Reuters世界亚太地区
Wilders urges deadlocked Dutch parties to explore unusual forms of governmentDutch far-right leader Geert Wilders said on Wednesday parties needed to explore unconventional forms of government to cobble together a viable governing coalition, as a traditional majority government looked unachievable. Wed, 14 Feb 2024 12:22:10 GMT C4OC5D534JLTVH32WEDPGEPQL4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/wilders-urges-deadlocked-dutch-parties-explore-unusual-forms-government-2024-02-14/Bart Meijer世界欧洲
